Html:
Is there any chance we could get the VS2003 version of the code for sproxy.exe? There were some subtle changes between 2003 and 2005 for the C++ stub generation and being able to compare the two sources would be very informative...

Gordon.

No, it is not possible to get VS2003 version of sproxy.exe. What is the change you are interested in?

Nikola

There were some changes made to the way C++ stub were generated, in particular the way nested arrays and array of arrays were handled - in my situation I never could get the 2005 way to work 100% and had to fall back to the old sproxy.exe to generate my stubs.

This may have been issues with the way I used the stubs, but I never investigated fully.

There is not a simple way to figure out which of all VS2005 checks in may caused this regression. If you have a repro case of the issue (WSDL, generated stub, etc), try debugging it with version of sproxy you may download from here. Also you may open an issue with a repro case on the issue tracker tab. Someone in community may find a solution to the problem.
